Text: Daniel Ståhl:  In June 2017, Ståhl managed a throw of 71.29 metres in Sollentuna, setting a new personal best and improving the Swedish record set in 1984 by Rickard Bruch by three centimetres.
Triplets:<Daniel Ståhl

<Text: Daniel Ståhl:  Ståhl's throw was the farthest discus throw in the world for four years.>
